item.title: Hpc v2
item.dc:creator: @hodunken hodunken
item.description:
@hodunken wrote:

parad0x_:

YOU ARE A CHEESY FRUITCAKE/NOOB/TACOMANWITHOUTANYFRIENDS!!!

spam…

HPC: no one has a problem with your work… like i said before, i respect that you are trying. its just theres no need to through out the copy right shit. thats all…

oh and don’t say you don’t care what we think about your work… why else would you post it? were not all idiots around here… we know why your posting it… don’t get all defensive

item.title: Hpc v2
item.dc:creator: @HPC_Jarod HPC_Jarod
item.description:
@HPC_Jarod wrote:

I dont post on my pictures because mostly everyone in this section only post things like “this is just shit to me…”. You notice I dont really care what others say (but some), so I’m going to continue my art and it just something everyone will have to get use to.

End of story
I dont care what you say, it does not effect me a bit. So get on with your life and stop posting stupidity to me, because its only a complement to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Hpc v2
item.dc:creator: @hodunken hodunken
item.description:
@hodunken wrote:

HPC… I really respect the fact that your trying and experimenting with photoshop but there is no need to always say things like “Do not copy” or “will only distribute via pm”. You must realize that there are much more talented artiest in this forum… why would someone want a copy of this stuff?

I cant flam on you because your posting noobish things like this because everyone has to start somewhere… but don’t come in with lesser quality work and saying that we CANT copy it… no one will ever copy the image you provided above. EVER. its just not something that we would be interesting in copying.

not to mention that every image you posted looks exactly the same as the one before.

I’m just trying to give you some advise on what you say around here… trust me, I have been through it all…

just post you work, and ask what people think about it and leave it at that.

oh and maybe try to make something different next time

Read full topic
